title: Loyalty Discount
description: 15% off for any repeat services booked within 3 months.
details: MUST include at least 4 consecutive days or more of services. Only good once per 3 months.

title: Loyalty Discount
description: 10% off for repeat services booked within 6 months.
details: MUST include at least 4 consecutive days or more of services. Only good once per 6 months.

title: Coupon
description: 10% off for 4 or more consecutive days of service. Cannot combine offers. Max value $50.

title: Holiday Coupon
description: The Holiday Surcharge (up to $20/day or $10/visit) will be refunded from a holiday booking with a second booking of 2 or more consecutive days completed within 3 months of the initial holiday booking.

title: Referral Coupon
description: A referral bonus valued at 15% of any initial referred business will be applied as a discount to the referring customer's next service request.
details: May be combined with one additional offer.
